game_description: This application is a technical demo intended for Quest developers using Unreal Engine 5. Tone mapping is an important artistic tool for developers. Graphics Showcase features a Vulkan subpass-based tone mapping solution that is much more performant than traditional techniques. Press B to cycle through these effects: - Day / Night cycle - Sepia LUT - Reddish LUT Press A to toggle tonemap subpass off / on Press Right Trigger to toggle FFR off / high Press Right Grip to toggle MSAA 1/2/4
